member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotePlacementChangedPreviewEventArgs
member.summary: Represents information about the NotePlacementChanged event.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotePlacementChangedPreviewEventArgs.ViewId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the note for which the NotePlacementChanged event was raised.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview
member.summary: This class owns much of the functionality of the **Preview Notes** application feature (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.IsScreenLocked
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the device's screen is currently locked.
member.returns: **true** if screen is locked, **false** if unlocked.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.NotePlacementChanged
member.summary: Indicates that a note's placement (dimensions and location) has changed.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.NoteVisibilityChanged
member.summary: Indicates that a note's visibility state has changed.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.SystemLockStateChanged
member.summary: Indicates that the device's screen lock state has changed.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.GetForCurrentApp
member.summary: Returns an instance of NotesWindowManagerPreview, to be used for the majority of Preview Notes operations that an app may execute.
member.returns: The app's designated instance of NotesWindowManagerPreview.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.GetNotePlacement(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the view placement of a given note, to be stored in program memory or on disk storage and then restored by the application at a later time.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note whose placement is to be retrieved.
member.returns: An array of bytes holding note placement data.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.HideNote(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a note's view to invisible and moves the focus to the next visible note view (window) or to the Windows Ink Workspace (see Remarks). The views are selected in a cyclic, system-determined order.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be hidden.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.SetFocusToNextView
member.summary: Switches focus to the next visible note view (window) or to the Windows Ink Workspace (see Remarks). The views are selected in a cyclic, system-determined order.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.SetFocusToPreviousView
member.summary: Switches focus to the previous visible note view (window) or to the Windows Ink Workspace (see Remarks). The views are selected in a cyclic, system-determined order.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.SetNotesThumbnailAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer)
member.summary: Sets the thumbnail image for this application as it appears in the Windows Ink Workspace, in the Alt+TAB task switcher, or on hovering in the taskbar.
member.param: A byte array describing the thumbnail image and usage (see Remarks).
member.returns: This method does not return a value.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.SetThumbnailImageForTaskSwitcherAsync(Windows.Graphics.Imaging.SoftwareBitmap)
member.summary: Asynchronously sets the thumbnail image for this application as it appears in the Alt+TAB task switcher.
member.param: A bitmap of the thumbnail image.
member.returns: Returns an **IAsyncAction** that indicates when the action has completed.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.ShowNote(System.Int32)
member.summary: Makes a note visible on the device screen.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be shown.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.ShowNoteRelativeTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Makes a note visible and places it adjacent to a specified "anchor" view.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be shown.
The Id of the "anchor" view. If this value is 0 (not assigned to any view), the note will appear at the center of the screen.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.ShowNoteRelativeTo(System.Int32,System.Int32,Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreviewShowNoteOptions)
member.summary: Makes a note visible and places it adjacent to a specified "anchor" view.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be shown.
The Id of the "anchor" view. If this value is 0 (not assigned to any view), the note will appear at the center of the screen.
Options for showing the note specified by the *noteViewId* parameter. For example, show the note with focus.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.ShowNoteWithPlacement(System.Int32,Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer)
member.summary: Makes a note visible and sets its placement data (dimensions and location) as specified.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be shown.
An array of bytes holding note placement data.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.ShowNoteWithPlacement(System.Int32,Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreviewShowNoteOptions)
member.summary: Makes a note visible and sets its placement data (dimensions and location) as specified.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be shown.
An array of bytes holding note placement data.
Options for showing the note specified by the *noteViewId* parameter. For example, show the note with focus.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreview.TrySetNoteSize(System.Int32,Windows.Foundation.Size)
member.summary: Resizes the specified note to the desired dimensions. If the given size is not recommended due to screen size/space issues, the note's size will not be changed.
member.param: The unique identifier of the note to be resized.
The desired dimensions of the note (use raw pixels when constructing).
member.returns: **true** if the note was resized, **false** if it was not resized due to screen restrictions.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreviewShowNoteOptions
member.summary: Provides options for how to show a note.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreviewShowNoteOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the NotesWindowManagerPreviewShowNoteOptions class.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NotesWindowManagerPreviewShowNoteOptions.ShowWithFocus
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies if the note should be shown with focus.
member.returns: If **true**, the note is shown with focus, otherwise **false**.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NoteVisibilityChangedPreviewEventArgs
member.summary: Represents information about the NoteVisibilityChanged event.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NoteVisibilityChangedPreviewEventArgs.IsVisible
member.summary: Indicates whether the note (specified by ViewId property) is visible on the device screen.
member.returns: **true** if note is visible, **false** if note is hidden.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Preview.Notes.NoteVisibilityChangedPreviewEventArgs.ViewId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the note for which the NoteVisibilityChanged event was raised.
